============
show_history
============

.. js:function:: show_history() 

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Item class </refs/client/item_api>`

Description
===========

Class show_history method of am item to open a dialog displaying history of 
changes of the selected record

See also
========

:doc:`Saving the history of changes made by users </admin/saving_history>`
